title: Senior Python Developer
description: We're looking for an experienced Python developer to join our backend team. You'll be responsible for developing and maintaining our web applications using Django and Flask, designing RESTful APIs, and deploying services on AWS.

title: Data Scientist
education_required: Master's in Data Science or related field
description: Join our data team to build predictive models, analyze large datasets, and create data visualizations. Experience with scikit-learn and TensorFlow required.

title: Frontend Developer (React)
description: We need a React developer to build user interfaces for our web applications. Experience with modern frontend tooling and state management required.

title: DevOps Engineer
education_required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field
description: Looking for a DevOps engineer to automate our deployment pipelines, manage cloud infrastructure, and improve system reliability.

title: UX/UI Designer
education_required: Degree in Design or related field
description: We're seeking a talented designer to create intuitive user experiences and beautiful interfaces for our digital products.
